## About Pocket
Pocket serves as your personal content curation platform, allowing you to capture and organize interesting articles, stories, and videos from across the web for later enjoyment. The application eliminates the frustration of browser tab overload by providing a centralized repository where you can save content with a single click and return to it when you have time to focus. Pocket's intelligent parsing technology strips away ads, navigation, and other distractions, presenting content in a clean, readable format optimized for comprehension and retention.

The desktop application delivers a comprehensive reading experience for both macOS and Windows users, featuring permanent archiving of saved content, powerful search capabilities, and organizational tools like tags and favorites. Pocket's text-to-speech functionality enables audio consumption of articles, while the recommendation system suggests new content based on your saving patterns and interests. With integration available in most browsers and mobile apps, Pocket becomes an essential tool for knowledge workers, researchers, students, and anyone who wants to efficiently manage their information intake in an increasingly content-rich digital landscape.

## âš™ï¸ System Requirements

**For macOS:**
*   macOS Monterey 12.0 or later
*   64-bit processor
*   4 GB RAM (8 GB recommended)
*   300 MB of available storage space

**For Windows:**
*   Windows 10 (64-bit) or later
*   4 GB RAM (8 GB recommended)
*   DirectX 11 compatible graphics card
*   300 MB of available storage space
